name: Post-sql
value: copy cdp_dwh.seismic_zone_codes_t from 's3://$$S3_Bucket_Name/Reinsurance/zona_sismica.csv' iam_role '$$AWS_IAM_ROLE' DELIMITER AS '|' IGNOREHEADER 1 REMOVEQUOTES ESCAPE NULL AS '\0' ;
